comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Joseph Sidney NAPTHALI born Chorlton (District of) Lancashire September quarter 1881 Vol 8c, page 847 Joseph S NAPTHALI marriage to BOOTH Bolton Lancashire March quarter 1936 Vol 8c page 439 Joseph S NAPHTALI died Salford Lancashire (District of) March quarter 1946 Vol 8d, page 654 freebmd.rootsweb.com/

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: Son of Joseph S and Elizabeth A Napthali. Siblings Edith M (16), Nelly E (14), Charles E (12), Frank H (4) and Gilbert F (2) in 1891. The family were living at 350 Stretford Road, Hulme, Manchester where Joseph Snr was a Furniture Dealer. Joseph Solomon Napthali died 27 Oct 1925 at 350 Stretford Road. Probate granted to his widow Elizabeth Ann. Effects £729 16s. Joseph Sidney married Alice Mary Cranshaw in 1906 and their son, Sidney Vaughan, was born in 1910 in Patricroft. Information via Salford War Memorials salfordwarmemorials.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=men&amp.... showed that Joseph Sidney and his family were living at 94 Shakespeare Crescent, Patricroft Lancashire maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.r_qf.... Surname spelled Naphtali. Alice died in 1935 in Bolton and Joseph remarried the following year. Marriage: 25 Feb 1936 St Peter, Bolton, Lancashire, England Joseph Sidney Naphtali - full School Master Widower of 5 Bromwich St, Bolton maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.r_qf... Alice Booth - full Widow of 84 Hilden St, Bolton Groom's Father: Joseph Solomon Naphtali, deceased, Furniture Dealer Bride's Father: Emmanuel Stanley, Joiner Witness: Henry Humphrey; Rachel Stanley Married by Licence by: W.J. Havelock Davidson Vicar of Bolton Register: Marriages 1927 - 1938, Page 124, Entry 248 Source: Microfilm of register at Manchester Library Joseph Sidney Napthali died 23 Jan 1946 at Hope Hospital Salford, He was of 13 Wennington Road, Southport maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.r_qf.... Probate was granted to Sidney Vaughan Napthali commercial traveller. Effects £407 2s 5d. After Joseph's death Alice changed her name by deed poll back to Alice Booth according to a London Gazette advertisement of 1948. 951034 Sidney Vaughan NAPHTALI (138944) (note the change of spelling of the surname) is mentioned in the London Gazette as a Corporal in 1943. He died in 1968 in Kerrier, Cornwall.
